text: Brian Baldinger (born January 7, 1960) is a football analyst and former football player for the Dallas Cowboys, Indianapolis Colts, and Philadelphia Eagles. His jobs include these: *NFL Network studio analyst/reporter *Philadelphia Eagles preseason color commentator *College Football on FSN color commentator *NFL on Fox color commentator *Cotton Bowl Classic on Fox sideline reporter *NFL Europe on Fox color commentator *NFL on CMN color commentator *Atlanta Falcons preseason color commentator ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at Databasefootball.com *Profile at Pro-Football- Reference.com Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:College football broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh Category:American football players Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:Indianapolis Colts players Category:Dallas Cowboys players
title: Brian Baldinger
